citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
The facility’s current pest control program is ineffective. At the time of inspection, a large rat was observed in close
proximity to the lemur enclosures. The facility representative stated that they are currently experiencing problems with rats
and plan to implement addition pest control measures to eliminate the rodent population. Pests can transmit disease,
contaminate food and surfaces, and can harm animals. The facility must establish and maintain an effective program for
the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests. Correct by May 24,2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.84(d) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
The facility’s current pest control program is ineffective. At the time of inspection, a large rat was observed in close 
proximity to the lemur enclosures. The facility representative stated that they are currently experiencing problems with rats 
and plan to implement addition pest control measures to eliminate the rodent population. Pests can transmit disease, 
contaminate food and surfaces, and can harm animals. The facility must establish and maintain an effective program for 
the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests. Correct by May 24,2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
